title: can we get some vision items in 3v3
body:
I don't mean wards, because fair enough that's how the game mode is but i am sick to death of going up against a {{champion:17}}  and not being able to clear shrooms effectively,  but if we could get even just an oricals elixir (i mean aram has it) it would make 3v3 alot better when going up against champs with invisible traps.
 just a thought.

replies.body: But there always has to be some counter otherwise its unfair, and the trinket comes back way too slow.
I hate versing Teemo in 3v3, but at the end of the day, Teemo is not a good 3v3 champion, and such an item would destroy all invis champions. You already have the trinket to do so.
Oricals i could support. However that item is redundant without a Teemo being on the other team.
